creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: red lacquered kettle with long, delicate spout, scalloped, erect handle, concentric raised rings around body; stands on three carved feet; flower-like lid with long, spindly knob
markings: characters carved into side of lid
medium: Negoro ware; wood, red and black lacquer
signed: Inside lid and on bottom: en | myo
title: Hot-water ewer
